title: Nex-Gen off road Ultra-Sealant has some big claims and even bigger active temperature range
content:
Nex-Gen is a company that you may not be familiar with, but if you take a glance at their site, you’ll see the company has big plans for the cycling world. Handlebars, chain lube, 3-D printed saddles, and much more are on the “Coming Soon” side. Their new Ultra Sealant, “a custom synthetic off-road sealant

The post Nex-Gen off road Ultra-Sealant has some big claims and even bigger active temperature range appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
